title: Seattle City Council Council Briefing 9/20/21
description:
View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy

In-person attendance is currently prohibited per Washington State Governor's Proclamation 20-28.15, until the COVID-19 State of Emergency is terminated or Proclamation 20-28 is rescinded by the Governor or State legislature. Meeting participation is limited to access by telephone conference line and online by the Seattle Channel.
Agenda: Approval of the Minutes, President's Report; Presentation on Terminal 5 Modernization Project; Preview of Today's City Council Actions, Council and Regional Committees; Executive Session on Real Estate Transaction*.
*Executive Sessions are closed to the public
0:00 Call to order
2:27 Presentation on Terminal 5 Modernization Project
39:01 Preview of Today's City Council Actions, Council and Regional Committees
